item.description:
UPDATE: - 2/12/10

I'm so looking forward to this event - we've got a great evening planned. It is turning out that our emcee may have some travel plan changes that may prevent him from being at Lucky's. We will reschedule him for another event later on this year and we will fend for ourselves in style.

Please note: The price is set at $22.00, you may also want to invite your friends to this one.

See you on Saturday, February 20th at Lucky's.

Don't forget to confirm your RSVP. Thanks!!
- diana



Ticket cost : $22.00
includes admission, entertainment, and passed hot and cold O'dourves. There will be a cash bar.

DETAILS:
We will meet at Lucky's in Boston at 6p. We've got our own space to mingle, snack, drink, dance, and play group Trivia. Our event will go until 9 or so and we can then join Lucky's in their regular Saturday night program of live music, and of course, A Touch of Sinatra!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Boston Baby Boomers - Celebrate our First Year of Meetups
